results.title: [What do we Mean by "Ideal" Blood Pressure Control?]
results.text_hl: Therefore, the FC @<m>CHEMICAL_amlodipine_perindopril_drug_combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C542336 @@@amlodipine/perindopril@@@ can be recommended for a broad range of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@AH@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ to achieve BP control and to improve the prognosis.

citations.NLM: Ostroumova OD, Kochetkov AI, Arablincky NA, Shatalova NA, Romanovsky RR, Kirichenko AA. [What do we Mean by "Ideal" Blood Pressure Control?] Kardiologiia. 2021 Jul 31;61(7):68-78. PMID: 34397344
